content: Finish the coding assignment on data structures and algorithms.
Spend 30 minutes reading a book of your choice.
Go for a 45-minute jog in the park.
Draft a blog post about a recent technology trend.
Experiment with cooking a new recipe for dinner.
Join the webinar on machine learning best practices.
Declutter and organize your workspace for better productivity.
Solve a set of coding challenges to enhance programming skills.
Explore a documentary on a historical event or scientific discovery.
Make a list of activities for the upcoming weekend with friends and family.
